title: Login page not working
description: Users are unable to login with valid credentials. The login form reloads without error but access is still denied.

title: UI bug on dashboard
description: Charts on the dashboard fail to render correctly on mobile screens. Elements overlap and distort user view.

title: Email notifications delayed
description: Customers report that system-generated emails are delayed by several minutes, causing missed alerts and confusion.

title: Payment gateway error
description: Transactions through the payment gateway fail intermittently. Some users cannot complete purchases or receive receipts.

title: Profile picture upload fails
description: Uploading profile images larger than 5MB always fails. Error messages do not guide users on file size or format limits.

title: Slow page loading
description: The dashboard requires more than 10 seconds to load on most devices. Users complain performance is slowing workflows.

title: Forgot password link broken
description: Password reset emails are sent correctly, but the included reset link opens to a 404 page, preventing password changes.

title: Incorrect invoice total
description: When discounts are applied, invoices show incorrect totals. Customers see mismatched billing values across statements.

title: Notification settings reset
description: User notification preferences are not saving correctly. After logging out, all settings reset back to system defaults.

title: Search function not returning results
description: The search bar does not return results for exact keyword matches. Users must enter partial terms for limited results.

title: Export to CSV not working
description: Report export to CSV fails silently. Clicking the export button does nothing, leaving users without a downloaded file.

title: Broken links on FAQ page
description: Several links on the FAQ page redirect users to unrelated pages. Customers cannot access helpful content or guidance.
